thread.section_title: Wellington Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Traditional and quirky
thread.title_full: Traditional and quirky - Review of Wellington Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Christine M
title: Traditional and quirky
text:
It's a welcoming hotel, and very well sited - practically on top of the subway on 57th Street and within walking distance of the sights. The decor itself is a bit faded but that's part of it's charm - watch out for the split level lifts and flooring. The Park Cafe offers a great breakfast. I would call it comfortable rather than professional. It was a great bonus to have not only a fridge but a microwave
Room Tip: Higher floors are quieter - I travelled alone and got an upgrade See more room tips
